synopsis.text: Macross enthusiasts were treated to a series of exciting announcements during the franchise's second 'Walkūre ga Tomaranai' concert in Yokohama. Marking the 35th anniversary of the beloved science-fiction romance anime series, the event culminated with the revelation of a new television anime slated for 2018. Fast forward to the final day of the 'Walküre FINAL LIVE TOUR 2023 ~Last Mission~' concert, fans were once again thrilled with the announcement of an upcoming animation project, signifying the Macross franchise's continuous evolution and commitment to delivering fresh content for its dedicated fanbase.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
